name: Declare-It
overview:
Declare-It is an easy to use web application that helps individuals set, track, and be held accountable to their goals. It focuses on several major areas of achievement such as health, finances, education, relationships, career and business. Once a user has decided what goal they want to achieve, Declare-It requires them to add at least 3 supporters. Supporters receive updates on the users progress. If the user starts to fall off track the supporters receive an alert message.

Recent studies show that you are 30% more likely to achieve a goal if you have someone have someone or multiple people helping you along the way. Declare-It uses social accountability to help users not only stay on track but also offer incentives along the way.

Road blocks are inevitable. The Virtual Vision Board helps you stay inspired. For each separate declaration, the Virtual Vision Board allows you to upload motivational photos such as an image of your dream home or pictures of your family. Supporters can also submit encouraging comments to the board for you to read.

Supporters have the ability to add various incentives. Incentives include a free lunch, gift card, cash, a vacation trip, and a suprise gift. Each incentive can be customized based on the user reaching a specific milestone such as hitting the half-way mark or completing the declaration entirely.

Declare-It is not just for personal goal-setting. Businesses can set goals for their company. Declare-It helps business owners concentrate on things that grow their company like acquiring customers and recruiting new talent. Declare-It allows user to record, track and view their progress with rich, interactive charts. You can also add and receive incentives for hitting specific business goals you set.
